2024.7.28

Original:
想不到可以在路邊的小餐館用220吃到道地的carbonara，不加一滴奶油，單純靠蛋黃跟Parmigiano-Reggiano做出黏稠度但不粘膩，而且麵條有嚼勁al dente不軟爛👍搭上風味特殊的手工黑糖培根，吃這盤就值回票價了
整面牆的紅酒，可惜我不喝酒 …
EN:
Unexpectedly, you can eat authentic Carbonara with 220 at a small restaurant on the roadside, without adding a drop of cream, just rely on egg yolk and Parmigiano-Reggiano to make sticky but not sticky, and the noodles are chewy Al Dente. The special handmade brown sugar bacon, the fare is worth the fare when eating this disk
Red wine on the entire wall, but unfortunately I don't drink ...
